item.title: BP On Clean Energy Initiatives: We’re Just Getting Started
item.itunes:author: Michael Brush <info@investorideas.com>
item.itunes:summary: When BP chief Tony Hayward commented earlier this year that he’s trying to figure out how BP shareholders can get more credit for the company’s alternative energy efforts, speculation arose that the company was planning to sell its green businesses. In this interview, the head of BP’s Alternative Energy Division, Vivian Cox, clarifies the company’s commitment to green energy development.

item.title: Gold-MiningStocks.com – Kitco’s Jon Nadler Discusses a New Opportunity for Canadians to Purchase Physical Gold in their Registered Retirement Savings Plans
item.itunes:subtitle: Gold Continues to be a Valuable Long-Term Capital Preservation Strategy for Investment Portfolios
item.itunes:author: Ann-Marie Fleming <info@investorideas.com>
item.itunes:summary: A discussion with Kitco’s Investment Products Analyst, Mr. Jon Nadler, on a new product recently introduced by Questrade and Kitco that provides Canadians with the opportunity to purchase physical gold in their registered retirement savings plans. The discussion also looks at the value of gold as an investment given the current market, the impact of China and India as well as its long term growth potential.
